rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0001
rows.name:
A well fought victory indeed.
Such a shame it cannot bring back that which was lost to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0002
rows.name: But this is spilled milk over the dam, now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0003
rows.name:
I just don't get it...
What do they have against humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm not sure how they wound up on Mira,
but you saw the mech—that is definitely them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0005
rows.name: Who?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0006
rows.name:
The aliens that destroyed Earth—
the Ganglion were among them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0007
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0008
rows.name:
It wasn't just them, of course, but they were definitely
one of the forces involved in that battle.[ST:page p1=150 ]I'm absolutely positive now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0009
rows.name: That Skell-like mech we just saw—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0010
rows.name:
check it against the NLA records and
I'm pretty sure it'll come back with a perfect match.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0011
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Anyway, we really appreciate all your help here, L,
but we need to be heading back now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0013
rows.name: Not at all! We only wish we could have done more...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0014
rows.name:
I wish we could compensate you somehow,
but honestly, there's nothing left for us to give...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0015
rows.name: Compensate, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0015_2
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0016
rows.name: How about allowing us to accompany you back to your city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0017
rows.name:
You want to come back to New LA?
...Why, exactly?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0018
rows.name: Well, our treasure trove was destroyed...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Without the Archives, we're afraid
our thirst for knowledge cannot be quenched.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0020
rows.name: But an entire Earth city to explore?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Such an experience would provide
compensation beyond compare![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0022
rows.name: The thought makes us tingle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0023
rows.name: Oookay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0024
rows.name: Hmm... What do you think, Rook?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_JNK0010
rows.name: Trust

rows.label: xs04110100_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest it sounds like fun.

rows.label: xs04110100_JNK0020
rows.name: Distrust

rows.label: xs04110100_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest L could be a spy for the Ganglion.

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0025
rows.name: Yeah. We're not like the Ganglion, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0026
rows.name: We want to live in harmony with all the other species here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0027
rows.name:
You think so? This guy?
I dunno. I'm just not seeing it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0028
rows.name:
I mean, he talks funny, and he's got one of those
"blah!" faces, but he doesn't seem like a bad guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0030
rows.name: Linly right. All Miran natives are good, honest folk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0031
rows.name:
Looks like you're outvoted.
Besides, we can't be like the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0032
rows.name: We want to live in harmony with all the other species here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0033
rows.name:
Then it's settled. Excellent. Let's be off!
The early worm is for the birds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04110100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Right, let's start heading back.
We should report to the commander at once.[ST:wait ]
